content.query:
CREATE PROC [dbo].[dimCustomersVanArsdel]
AS
BEGIN
INSERT INTO dbo.dimCustomers_VanArsdel
	([SourceSytemID] ,
	[CustomerSK] ,
	[CustomerID] ,
	[LastName] ,
	[FirstName] ,
	[AddressLine1] ,
	[AddressLine2] ,
	[City] ,
	[State] ,
	[ZipCode] ,
	[PhoneNumber] ,
	[RecordStartDate],
	[RecordEndDate],
	[ActiveFlag] )
SELECT 
3,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', CONCAT(FirstName,LastName,PhoneNumber)
), 2) AS CustomerSK,
TRIM(CustomerID),
TRIM(LastName),
TRIM(FirstName),
TRIM(AddressLine1) ,
TRIM(AddressLine2),
TRIM(City),
TRIM(State),
TRIM(ZipCode),
TRIM(PhoneNumber),
 CreatedDate,
 UpdatedDate,
1

FROM dbo.VanArsdel_Customers
END
